(ooc: I'm SO sorry guys! i didnt know that menasor was far away and i 
figured a gestalt wouldn't be too hard to hit, and i thought i could post 
Element hitting. i'm sorry this is a short post, but i have to go)

Element growled, slowing down at Astroblast's threat. He looked from 
Astroblast to Menasor.

"Allright. Let the Maximal go and I'll let you live. If you leave with him, 
I'll go after you and kill you."

It wasn't a threat, it was a promise. Mantle wasn't going to let this bot 
take Firearm, and that meant that Element wasn't going to either.
